description:
A Comprehensive Resource for Tautomerism Analyses.

Tautomer Structures Extracted from Experimental Literature.

Release 1 : Release 2 : Release 3 :.

A spreadsheet (Tautomer_database_release_3.xlsx file) with 5,977 structures extracted from experimental literature representing 2,819 cases of tautomeric tuples (mostly tautomer pairs but also a few triples and higher-order tuples). All structures have been annotated with experimental conditions, structure identifiers, bibliographic references and types of tautomerism involved. The structures and experiment-related data were extracted from a total of 171 publications, including reviews reporting on multiple primary studies.

2,819 Tautomeric Tuples Comprising 5,977 Structures.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'tautomeric entry', 'Tautomerism Analyses'
name: Tautomer Database
